lead_paragraph: A report last Saturday in a roundup of vignettes about the cross section of people who attended the Yankees’ ticker-tape parade carried an erroneous byline. The entry about a student in Philadelphia who attended the parade in the spirit of his grandmother, a Yankees fan who died during the All-Star break, was by Ravi Somaiya — not by Daniel E. Slotnik, who contributed another entry.
